definitions.text: move forward, also in the metaphorical sense
bring forward for consideration or acceptance
increase or raise
examples: boost the voltage in an electrical circuit

definitions.text: contribute to the progress or growth of
examples: I am promoting the use of computers in the classroom

definitions.text: cause to move forward
examples: Can you move the car seat forward?

definitions.text: obtain advantages, such as points, etc.
examples: The home team was gaining ground
After defeating the Knicks, the Blazers pulled ahead of the Lakers in the battle for the number-one playoff berth in the Western Conference

definitions.text: develop in a positive way
develop further
examples: We are advancing technology every day

definitions.text: give a promotion to or assign to a higher position
examples: John was kicked upstairs when a replacement was hired
Women tend not to advance in the major law firms
I got promoted after many years of hard work

definitions.text: pay in advance
examples: Can you advance me some money?

definitions.text: move forward
examples: we have to advance clocks and watches when we travel eastward

definitions.text: rise in rate or price
examples: The stock market gained 24 points today

definitions.text: farther along in physical or mental development
examples: the child's skeletal age was classified as `advanced'
children in the advanced classes in elementary school read far above grade average

definitions.text: comparatively late in a course of development
examples: the illness had reached an advanced stage

definitions.text: ahead of the times
examples: had advanced views on the subject

definitions.text: at a higher level in training or knowledge or skill
examples: special seminars for small groups of advanced students at the University

definitions.text: ahead in development; complex or intricate
far along in time
(of societies) highly developed especially in technology or industry
situated ahead or going before
examples: at that time the most advanced outpost was still east of the Rockies
